main event: A UFO sighting involving a bluish trail observed from an aircraft crew on June 23, 1950, in Mobile, Alabama.
interesting points: The sighting was reported to have a duration of 15 to 30 minutes., The object was described as having a spiral descent., The incident was observed from an altitude of 50,000 feet., A weatherman later suggested that the flash seen might have been a large meteorite., The report was associated with Project Blue Book, an Air Force program for investigating UFOs.
witness description: A/C crew and a housewife, R.K., who was an airline pilot.
